snippet.title: [ PC ] Waves of the Atlantide ( WOTA ) - Launch Trailer - INDIE GAME 2019
snippet.description:
STEAM : https://store.steampowered.com/app/992210/Waves_of_the_Atlantide/

Waves of the Atlantide (WotA) is a novative mix of gender. It is a Battle Royale - Board Game Like - RTS. It focuses on strategy over tactics, yet doesn't have the caveat of strategy or management games that often require 20 or more hours to complete. In WotA whole games are finished in under 25 minutes thanks to the battle royale mode.

It is a unique mix of genders, picture Civilization and the board game Risk having an illegitimate battle royale child.
It's a strategy game at its core with 4X elements and you can play entire games from start to finish on your lunch break !

It's a kind of quicker Civilization .

The game is now available on STEAM


https://twitter.com/WAtlantide

Wishlist it on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/992210/Waves_of_the_Atlantide/

#WotA #indieGame
